idea-plugin.name: Save Actions
idea-plugin.description:
Supports configurable, Eclipse like, save actions, including "organize imports", "reformat code" and "rearrange code". The plugin executes the configured actions when the file is synchronised (or saved) on disk.

Features

  • Organize imports
  • Reformat code (only changed text or all)
  • Rearrange code (reorder methods, fields, etc.)
  • Works on any file type Intellij IDEA can reformat (Java, XML, etc.)
  • Simple option page to activate / deactivate actions

Configuration

  • Activate the plugin in Intellij IDEA: "File > Settings > Other Settings > Save Actions"
  • See configuration documentation at https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions/blob/master/README.md

Compatibility

This plugin works with Java 6+ and Intellij IDEA Community Edition after 131 (around version 13).

Resources

  • code: https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions
  • documentation: https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions/blob/master/README.md
  • issues: https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions/issues
  • questions: https://twitter.com/dubreuia
